text: Home from the Hill is a 1960 American drama movie directed by Vincente Minnelli and based on the 1958 novel of the same name by William Humphrey. It stars Robert Mitchum, Eleanor Parker, George Peppard, George Hamilton, Everett Sloane, Luana Patten and was distributed by Metro-Goldwyn-Mayer. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1960 drama movies Category:American drama movies Category:Movies based on books Category:Movies directed by Vincente Minnelli
title: Home from the Hill (movie)
